attributes.action: make all housing associations subject to the provisions of the Freedom of Information Act 2000.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Freedom of Information Act 2000 created a general right of access to information across the public sector.

However, despite housing associations and other registered social landlords having received millions of what were council homes often at minimal cost; together with receiving tens of millions of pounds of Housing Benefit each year, they remain wholly unaccountable in any meaningful sense to the public, are not currently subject to the Freedom of Information Act or to any other form of open public scrutiny.

We therefore petition the Prime Minister to subject all housing associations to the provisions of the Freedom of Information Act 2000.
